title: Bruni Media Taps Entertainment Vet Lance H. Robbins as President
text:
LOS ANGELES, Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Los Angeles-based Bruni Media announced today that former Saban Entertainment and Fox Family Television Studios President Lance H. Robbins has joined the company as acting President. Robbins brings to Bruni Media significant experience in financial growth and leadership, industry relationships, and a long and illustrious track record of brand strategy, consumer engagement, creative direction, production and storytelling.
In his new position, Robbins will handle key strategic accounts and business development efforts for the company, oversee the expansion of the Creative and Production divisions, as well as staffing of the Los Angeles, New York and Minneapolis offices.
"We are very excited to have Lance join the agency," says CEO Sam Bruni. "We are committed to providing a truly unique and groundbreaking experience for our clients. Bringing Lance on board highlights our belief in the compelling interconnectedness of the traditional, digital and virtual mediums through which we tell our clients' stories."
"Sam and his team at Bruni Media provide innovative creative, advertising, marketing, technology, and digital transformation services to an amazing roster of trailblazing clients," Robbins says. "It offered an irresistible challenge for me and I'm excited to be part of the enrichment, diversity and expansion of Bruni Media."
During his tenure as president of Saban Entertainment ("Power Rangers," "Ninja Turtles") and Fox Family Television Studios, Robbins produced over 60 award-winning television movies and features, as well as scripted and unscripted series. He played a key role in the sale of the company to ABC/Disney for a record $5.2 billion dollars. In 2005, he founded Alternative Media Marketing, an Omni-channel agency focused on market disruption strategies, branded content creation, commercials, short form digital campaigns and digital transformation.
Bruni Media is a full-service agency, specializing in marketing, advertising, media planning, e-commerce, SEO, affiliate marketing, e-mail marketing, analytics and business intelligence, machine learning and artificial intelligence.
